item.title: Stellantis从中国合资伙伴东风汽车公司回购价值10亿美元的股票
item.description:
Chrysler-parent Stellantis (STLAM.MI) said on Wednesday it has repurchased 50 million common shares from Dongfeng Motor (Hong Kong) International (0489.HK) for about 934 million euros ($1.02 billion).翻译:克莱斯勒母公司Stellantis (STLAM.MI)周三表示，已以约9.34亿欧元（10.2亿美元）从东风汽车（香港）国际（0489.HK）回购5000万股普通股。

Stellantis, which has a joint venture with Dongfeng Motor in China, said it plans to cancel these shares and the transaction with Dongfeng would not impact its 1.5 billion euros open-market repurchase program.翻译:与东风汽车在中国设有合资企业的Stellantis表示，计划注销这些股份，与东风的交易不会影响其15亿欧元的公开市场回购计划。

The program, announced on Feb. 22, is expected to complete by the end of 2023.翻译:该计划于 2 月 22 日宣布，预计将于 2023 年底完成。

Chinese automaker Dongfeng would retain 49.2 million common shares, which represents 1.58% of Stellantis' share capital post-cancellation.翻译:中国汽车制造商东风汽车将保留 4920 万股普通股，占注销后 Stellantis 股本的 1.58%。

($1 = 0.9168 euros)翻译:（1 美元 = 0.9168 欧元）

item.title: 早间买盘：市场充满节日气氛
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets from Lewis Krauskopf, markets correspondent.翻译:市场通讯员刘易斯·克劳斯科普夫 (Lewis Krauskopf) 对亚洲市场未来一天的展望。

Markets were buoyant ahead of Asia trading and the Thanksgiving holiday in the U.S., with stocks resuming their massive rally this month that has been fueled by hopes of a more benign interest rate backdrop.翻译:在亚洲交易和美国感恩节假期之前，市场表现活跃，本月股市恢复大幅上涨，这是由于对更温和的利率背景的希望推动的。

Wall Street's benchmark S&P 500 (.SPX) closed up 0.4%, and was nearing a fresh high for 2023. The S&P 500 and MSCI's all-country index (.MIWD00000PUS) are both up over 8% this month alone, with the tech-heavy Nasdaq Composite (.IXIC) up 11%.翻译:华尔街基准标准普尔 500指数(.SPX)收盘上涨 0.4%，接近 2023 年新高。仅本月，标准普尔 500 指数和 MSCI 全国指数(.MIWD00000PUS)均上涨超过 8%，其中科技股纳斯达克综合指数(.IXIC)上涨 11%。

Markets were still digesting minutes from the Federal Reserve's latest meeting, which revealed that central bank officials agreed they would proceed carefully and only raise interest rates if progress in controlling inflation faltered.翻译:市场仍在消化美联储最新会议纪要，会议纪要显示，央行官员同意，他们将谨慎行事，只有在控制通胀进展缓慢的情况下才会加息。

Indeed, many investors now seem confident the Fed may be done raising rates for this cycle, and are eyeing the middle of next year for when the central bank may start to make cuts.翻译:事实上，许多投资者现在似乎对美联储可能完成本周期加息充满信心，并期待明年中期央行可能开始降息。

Even Nvidia's (NVDA.O) selloff following its results couldn't dampen Wednesday's mood. After soaring well over 200% this year, Nvidia shares ended down 2.5% on Wednesday amid fears that widening U.S. chip curbs would sap growth in China.翻译:即使英伟达(NVDA.O) 在公布业绩后遭遇抛售，也未能抑制周三的情绪。在今年飙升超过 200% 后， 英伟达股价周三收盘下跌2.5%，原因是担心美国扩大芯片限制将削弱中国的增长。

Aside from Nvidia, other members of the Magnificent Seven megacap group rallied on Wednesday, with Amazon (AMZN.O) gaining nearly 2% and Alphabet (GOOGL.O) and Microsoft (MSFT.O) up over 1%.翻译:除英伟达外，七巨头集团的其他成员周三也纷纷上涨，其中亚马逊(AMZN.O)上涨近 2%，Alphabet (GOOGL.O)和微软(MSFT.O)上涨超过 1%。

A Reuters poll of stock market experts found most key global stock indexes are forecast to rise modestly over the coming year.翻译:路透社对股市专家的一项调查发现，预计全球大多数主要股指在未来一年将小幅上涨。

Japanese markets were also set to be closed for a national holiday on Thursday. On Wednesday, the Nikkei .N225 edged up 0.3%, putting the Japanese index near a fresh three-decade high.翻译:日本市场周四也因国定假日休市。周三，日经指数.N225小幅上涨0.3% ，使日本指数接近三年来的新高。

Also in Wednesday's session, China stocks slid as market participants awaited more stimulus for the Chinese economy. The blue-chip CSI 300 Index (.CSI300) sank 1%.翻译:同样在周三的交易中，由于市场参与者等待中国经济出台更多刺激措施，中国股市下跌。蓝筹股沪深300指数（.CSI300）下跌1%。

Reuters reported that Chinese government advisers will recommend economic growth targets for next year ranging from 4.5% to 5.5% to an annual policymakers' meeting, as Beijing seeks to create jobs and keep long-term development goals on track.翻译:路透社报道称，中国政府顾问将向年度政策制定者会议推荐明年4.5%至5.5% 的经济增长目标，因为北京寻求创造就业机会并保持长期发展目标步入正轨。

Meanwhile, the dollar index rose, bouncing back from a 2-1/2 month low. Economic data showed the number of Americans filing new claims for unemployment benefits fell more than expected last week.翻译:与此同时， 美元指数上涨，从2-1/2个月低点反弹。 经济数据显示，上周美国初请失业金人数降幅超过预期。

The yen weakened on Wednesday, trading at around 150 per dollar. While speculation that the Bank of Japan could exit from negative interest rates early next year stands to help stabilize the yen, the Japanese currency still faces strong headwinds.翻译:周三日元走软，交易价格为 1 美元兑 150 日元左右。尽管有关日本央行可能于明年初退出负利率的猜测有助于稳定日元，但日元仍面临强劲阻力。

Oil prices dropped as OPEC+ producers unexpectedly delayed a meeting on production cuts.翻译:由于OPEC+产油国意外推迟减产会议， 油价下跌。

Trading volumes were set to be subdued for the rest of the week with markets in the U.S. closed on Thursday.翻译:由于美国市场周四休市，本周剩余时间交易量预计将低迷。

Here are key developments that could provide more direction to markets on Thursday:翻译:以下是周四可能为市场提供更多方向的关键进展：

- Singapore CPI翻译:- 新加坡消费物价指数

- Indonesia Central Bank meeting翻译:- 印度尼西亚央行会议

- Euro zone flash PMIs翻译:- 欧元区 PMI 初值

item.title: 由于对中国的担忧掩盖了出色的预测，英伟达股价下跌
item.description:
Nvidia (NVDA.O) shares fell nearly 4% on Wednesday on fears that widening U.S. chip curbs would sap growth in China, its third largest market, and curtail the AI-driven boom in its business.翻译:英伟达(NVDA.O)股价周三下跌近 4%，原因是担心美国扩大芯片限制将削弱其第三大市场中国的增长，并抑制人工智能驱动的业务繁荣。

The company was set to erase more than $40 billion in market capitalization if losses hold, based on its current share price of $482.20.翻译:根据目前 482.20 美元的股价，如果亏损持续下去，该公司将损失超过 400 亿美元的市值。

Nvidia, which has been at the forefront of artificial intelligence developments with its tailor-made graphics processing units, said its China business will take a hit from tighter export controls.翻译:凭借其定制的图形处理单元一直处于人工智能发展前沿的英伟达表示，其中国业务将受到更严格的出口管制的打击。

Still, it forecast current-quarter revenue of $20 billion, plus or minus 2%, beating analysts' average estimate by more than $2 billion, according to LSEG data.翻译:不过，根据 LSEG 的数据，该公司预计本季度营收为 200 亿美元，上下浮动 2%，比分析师平均预期高出 20 亿美元以上。

China contributed more than a fifth of its total revenue in the quarter ended Oct. 29.翻译:截至 10 月 29 日的季度，中国贡献了其总收入的五分之一以上。

"This disconnect between stellar earnings and an uncertain future in China is causing investor concern," said Scott Acheychek, CEO of REX Shares, which offers a fund linked to Nvidia shares.翻译:REX Shares 首席执行官 Scott Aceychek 表示：“中国出色的盈利与不确定的未来之间的脱节正在引起投资者的担忧。”该公司提供与 Nvidia 股票挂钩的基金。

Nvidia has been one of the biggest beneficiaries of a rally in AI-linked stocks, with its shares gaining 229.8% compared to tech-heavy Nasdaq's (.IXIC) 36.6% rise so far this year.翻译:英伟达是人工智能相关股票上涨的最大受益者之一，其股价上涨了 229.8%，而以科技股为主的纳斯达克指数(.IXIC)今年迄今为止上涨了 36.6%。

"Nvidia's shares went into the results 'priced to perfection'....compounded by a run-up to record highs going into the release," said Capital.com analyst Kyle Rodda.翻译:Capital.com 分析师凯尔·罗达 (Kyle Rodda) 表示：“英伟达的股价进入了业绩‘定价完美’的阶段……此外，业绩发布后股价还创下历史新高。”

"As a result, despite fantastic financial performance and an even better outlook than analysts had been expecting, any bad news was bound to undermine sentiment."翻译:“因此，尽管财务业绩出色，前景比分析师预期还要好，但任何坏消息都必然会损害市场情绪。”

At least seven brokerages raised their target price for the stock with the median now at $625, more than $125 above its last closing price, signaling confidence that the business would grow as businesses adopt AI.翻译:至少有 7 家券商上调了该股的目标价，目前中位价为 625 美元，比上次收盘价高出 125 美元以上，表明人们有信心随着企业采用人工智能，该业务将会增长。

"Looking further out, NVDA continues to expect Data Center segment growth in 2025 and has plans to increase supply on a quarterly basis," brokerage Stifel said in note.翻译:券商 Stifel 在报告中表示：“展望未来，NVDA 继续预计数据中心细分市场将在 2025 年实现增长，并计划按季度增加供应。”

Reporting by Arsheeya Bajwa and Chavi Mehta in Bengaluru; Editing by Arun Koyyur翻译:Arsheeya Bajwa 和 Chavi Mehta 在班加罗尔的报道；阿伦·科尤尔编辑

item.title: 博通在中国获得批准后完成价值 690 亿美元的 VMware 交易
item.description:
Broadcom (AVGO.O) on Wednesday closed its $69 billion acquisition of cloud-computing firm VMware (VMW.N) after receiving regulatory approval in last major market China and ending a months-long saga.翻译:博通(AVGO.O)在最后一个主要市场中国获得监管部门批准后，周三完成了对云计算公司 VMware (VMW.N)的 690 亿美元收购，结束了长达数月的传奇。

The deal, one of the biggest globally when announced in May 2022, was the latest in CEO Hock Tan's efforts to boost the chipmaker's software business.翻译:该交易于 2022 年 5 月宣布，是全球最大的交易之一，也是首席执行官 Hock Tan 为推动这家芯片制造商的软件业务所做的最新努力。

However, the transaction faced tough regulatory scrutiny across the world and the companies had delayed the closing date three times.翻译:然而，该交易面临全球严格的监管审查，两家公司已三度推迟交割日期。

China's regulatory approval came through on Tuesday after ongoing tensions with the U.S. around tougher chip export control measures had stoked fears among some investors on the company's ability to close the deal before the Nov. 26 deadline.翻译:中国监管机构于周二获得批准，此前中美围绕更严格芯片出口管制措施的紧张关系引发了一些投资者对该公司能否在 11 月 26 日截止日期之前完成交易的担忧。

"The improved mood music after the meeting between China's President Xi Jinping and U.S. President Joe Biden earlier this month helped to settle remaining nerves," Danni Hewson, head of financial analysis at AJ Bell, said on Tuesday, after the companies said they planned to close the transaction on Nov. 22.翻译:AJ Bell 财务分析主管丹尼·休森 (Danni Hewson) 周二表示：“本月早些时候中国国家主席习近平与美国总统乔·拜登会晤后，气氛有所改善，有助于缓解剩余的紧张情绪。” 11 月 22 日结束交易。

The European Commission had approved the acquisition after Broadcom offered remedies to help rival Marvell Technology (MRVL.O) while the UK's Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) gave its green light following an in-depth investigation.翻译:在博通提供补救措施以帮助竞争对手 Marvell Technology (MRVL.O)后，欧盟委员会批准了此次收购，而英国竞争与市场管理局 (CMA) 经过深入调查后也批准了这项收购。

"Perhaps we will see some boards being willing to move forward now that we have seen the (Activision Blizzard) and (VMware) get blessing, but don't think we can count on it," said Cabot Henderson, market strategist at JonesTrading, on Tuesday.翻译:JonesTrading 市场策略师卡博特·亨德森 (Cabot Henderson) 表示：“也许我们会看到一些董事会愿意继续前进，因为我们已经看到（动视暴雪）和（VMware）得到了祝福，但我们不认为我们可以指望这一点。”周二。

Big Tech mergers such as Microsoft's (MSFT.O) now-closed $69 billion purchase of the "Call of Duty" publisher Activision have faced heightened regulatory pressure from the U.S. Federal Trade Commission under its Chair Lina Khan.翻译:微软(MSFT.O)现已以 690 亿美元收购《使命召唤》发行商动视暴雪 (Activision) 等大型科技公司的合并，面临着来自美国联邦贸易委员会主席莉娜·汗 (Lina Khan) 的更大监管压力。

Reporting by Harshita Mary Varghese; Editing by Sriraj Kalluvila翻译:Harshita Mary Varghese 报道；斯里拉杰·卡卢维拉编辑

item.title: 乌拉圭升级与中国的关系以与南美邻国抗衡
item.description:
Summary:
  • China, Uruguay upgrade ties, sign cooperation documents
  • Uruguay-China relations now match Argentina, Brazil
  • Mercosur membership restricts Uruguay from China deal
  • Uruguay plans to join China-led New Development Bank
翻译:概括：
  • 中乌提升关系并签署合作文件
  • 乌拉圭与中国关系现已与阿根廷、巴西相媲美
  • 南方共同市场成员资格限制乌拉圭参与中国交易
  • 乌拉圭计划加入中国主导的新开发银行

China and Uruguay upgraded their bilateral ties on Wednesday, setting the stage for further trade and investment and elevating the ambitious South American country's relations with Beijing to those of fellow Mercosur members Brazil and Argentina.翻译:中国和乌拉圭周三升级了双边关系，为进一步的贸易和投资奠定了基础，并将这个雄心勃勃的南美国家与北京的关系提升到南方共同市场成员国巴西和阿根廷的水平。

Uruguay is seeking to strike deals abroad that it hopes will be more beneficial to it than a local trade bloc, while China has for years sought closer ties with South America, in large part to secure access to raw materials such as grains and oils.翻译:乌拉圭正在寻求在海外达成比当地贸易集团更有利的协议，而中国多年来一直寻求与南美洲建立更密切的关系，很大程度上是为了确保获得谷物和石油等原材料。

"China is ready to work with Uruguay to take establishing a comprehensive strategic partnership as a new starting point... and enrich cooperation," President Xi Jinping told his Uruguayan counterpart Luis Lacalle Pou at a meeting in Beijing's Great Hall of the People, Chinese state media reported.翻译:习近平主席在北京人民大会堂会见乌拉圭总统拉卡列时表示，“中方愿同乌拉圭一道，以建立全面战略伙伴关系为新起点，丰富合作内容”。官方媒体报道。

China, the world's second-largest economy, is already a major investor in South America and has offered tariff-free access to its huge consumer market to four countries.翻译:作为世界第二大经济体的中国已经是南美洲的主要投资者，并向四个国家提供免关税进入其巨大消费市场的机会。

Lacalle Pou first proposed a free trade agreement (FTA) with China in 2021 to secure similar opportunities for its exporters as those enjoyed by Chile, Costa Rica, Ecuador, and Peru, and to boost exports of raw materials, industrial goods and technology.翻译:Lacalle Pou首次提出在2021年与中国签署自由贸易协定（FTA），以确保其出口商享有与智利、哥斯达黎加、厄瓜多尔和秘鲁类似的机会，并促进原材料、工业品和技术的出口。

But Uruguay faces opposition from other members of the Mercosur bloc who want to settle an FTA with Europe instead.翻译:但乌拉圭面临南方共同市场其他成员国的反对，这些成员国希望与欧洲达成自由贸易协定。

At present, Beijing has no tariff preference for Uruguayan beef, which constituted 67% of the South American country's exports to China in 2022, a market where there is a 12% tariff on the meat, United Nations COMTRADE data shows.翻译:联合国COMTRADE数据显示，目前北京对乌拉圭牛肉没有关税优惠，乌拉圭牛肉占2022年乌拉圭对华出口的67%，而中国市场对乌拉圭牛肉征收12%的关税。

By comparison, other major beef exporters Australia and New Zealand, which have FTAs with China, pay tariffs at 3.3% and 0%.翻译:相比之下，与中国签订自由贸易协定的其他主要牛肉出口国澳大利亚和新西兰的关税分别为3.3%和0%。

Lacalle Pou commented on how China has become Uruguay's main trading partner and told Xi during the meeting about plans to join the Shanghai-headquartered New Development Bank.翻译:拉卡勒·鲍评论了中国如何成为乌拉圭的主要贸易伙伴，并在会见期间向习近平介绍了加入总部位于上海的金砖国家开发银行的计划。

China received 27% of Uruguay's exports in 2022, COMTRADE data shows, while Brazil purchased 17% of its outbound shipments, and Argentina and the United States 6% each.

MERCOSUR

Uruguay cannot easily sign a unilateral FTA with China because it agreed to a 'Common External Tariff' with Mercosur members, not least because the bloc reached agreement in principle on an FTA with Brussels in 2019.翻译:乌拉圭无法轻易与中国签署单边自由贸易协定，因为它与南方共同市场成员国同意“共同对外关税”，尤其是因为该集团于 2019 年与布鲁塞尔就自由贸易协定原则上达成协议。

The South American country has applied to join a major trans-pacific free trade pact that China also aspires to join, but Beijing must overcome major political hurdles before it can accede to the agreement and Montevideo faces the same restraints its Mercosur membership places upon it in negotiations.翻译:这个南美国家已申请加入一项重要的跨太平洋自由贸易协定，中国也渴望加入，但北京必须克服重大政治障碍才能加入该协定，而蒙得维的亚也面临着南方共同市场成员国对其施加的同样限制。谈判。

Uruguay came close to signing an FTA with the United States in 2006, but its government at the time eventually rejected the deal over fears of expulsion from Mercosur if it did so.翻译:2006年，乌拉圭差点与美国签署自由贸易协定，但当时的政府最终拒绝了该协议，因为担心这样做会被逐出南方共同市场。

Under the Mercosur CET, Chinese exporters must pay tariffs at 9%, should they wish to export to Uruguay, which is better than the 12% Uruguayan ranchers face on beef shipped to China.翻译:根据南方共同市场CET，如果中国出口商希望向乌拉圭出口，则必须缴纳9%的关税，这比乌拉圭牧场主向中国出口牛肉所面临的12%关税要好。

According to a study conducted by the National Meat Institute of Uruguay in 2021, if China signs an FTA with Uruguay, the meat industry can implement a 0% preferential tariff, which will reduce tariffs by $150 million.翻译:乌拉圭国家肉类研究所2021年的一项研究显示，如果中国与乌拉圭签署自由贸易协定，肉类行业可以实施0%的优惠关税，这将减少1.5亿美元的关税。

Xi and Lacalle Pou witnessed the signing of cooperation documents across a range of sectors including agriculture, education, and science and technology, as well as over customs inspections, which could be a boon for Uruguay's meat exports.翻译:习近平和拉卡列·普共同见证了农业、教育、科技等领域合作文件的签署以及海关查验，这将有利于乌拉圭肉类出口。

Uruguay is one of the few countries to run a trade surplus with China, which last year doubled to $1.5 billion from $766 million in 2021, data from China's National Bureau of Statistics shows.翻译:中国国家统计局的数据显示，乌拉圭是少数对华贸易顺差的国家之一，贸易顺差从 2021 年的 7.66 亿美元翻了一番，达到 15 亿美元。

The elevation of ties with Uruguay to the level of Brazil and Argentina also pushes the remaining Mercosur member Paraguay further outside China's global trade and investment network.翻译:与乌拉圭的关系提升至巴西和阿根廷的水平，也将南方共同市场的剩余成员巴拉圭进一步排除在中国的全球贸易和投资网络之外。

Agriculture-dependent Paraguay, whose main exports include beef and soybeans, is the last South American nation that has ties with democratically governed Taiwan, which China claims as part of its territory, and not with Beijing.翻译:依赖农业的巴拉圭是最后一个与民主治理的台湾有联系的南美国家，中国声称台湾是其领土的一部分，但与北京没有联系。巴拉圭的主要出口产品包括牛肉和大豆。

Xi said he hoped to build "a model of solidarity and cooperation between countries of different sizes, systems and cultures" with Uruguay, while Lacalle Pou invited him to visit Uruguay next year.翻译:习近平表示，希望与乌拉圭打造“不同规模、不同制度、不同文化国家团结合作的典范”，拉卡列·普邀请他明年访问乌拉圭。

Reporting by Joe Cash and Ryan Woo; Additional reporting by Ella Cao; Editing by Toby Chopra, Raju Gopalakrishnan, Chizu Nomiyama and Alexander Smith翻译:乔·卡什 (Joe Cash) 和瑞安·吴 (Ryan Woo) 报道； Ella Cao 的补充报道；编辑：Toby Chopra、Raju Gopalakrishnan、Chizu Nomiyama 和 Alexander Smith

item.title: 日本政党访问中国以修复紧张关系
item.description:
The junior coalition partner of Japan's ruling Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) has sent a delegation to Beijing to meet with China's top leadership team as Asia's two largest economies seek to improve strained ties.翻译:日本执政党自民党的初级联盟伙伴已派出代表团前往北京与中国最高领导团队会面，亚洲两大经济体寻求改善紧张关系。

A Komeito party delegation led by the leader of the party Natsuo Yamaguchi on Wednesday met with Cai Qi, head of the powerful Secretariat of the Communist Party of China (CPC) Central Committee that oversees day-to-day affairs of the CPC.翻译:周三，由党魁山口那津夫率领的公明党代表团会见了负责中共日常事务的中共中央书记处书记蔡奇。

The ruling parties of both countries should "accurately grasp each other's development and strategic intentions," Chinese state media quoted Cai as telling the Japanese delegation.翻译:中国官方媒体援引蔡对日本代表团的话说，两国执政党应“准确把握对方的发展和战略意图”。

Both sides should work together to promote "positive" and "friendly" mutual understanding, added Cai, also the fifth-ranked member of the CPC's seven-person Politburo Standing Committee, the highest tier of political power in China helmed by President Xi Jinping.翻译:蔡补充道，双方应共同努力促进“积极”和“友好”的相互了解。他也是中国共产党七人政治局常务委员会的第五位成员，这是由习近平主席领导的中国最高政治权力机构。

The visit came on the heels of rare face-to-face talks between Xi and Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida, also LDP's leader, on the sidelines of an Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) summit in the United States last week during which both sides affirmed their strategic relationship.翻译:此次访问之前，习近平上周在美国举行的亚太经合组织（APEC）峰会期间与日本首相、自民党领袖岸田文雄进行了罕见的面对面会谈。肯定了双方的战略关系。

Bilateral ties have become strained after the neighbours clashed over issues from Japan's release of treated radioactive water into the ocean to maritime territorial claims, detention of Japanese citizens, Taiwan and export curbs.翻译:邻国在日本向海洋排放经过处理的放射性水、海洋领土主张、 拘留日本公民、台湾和出口限制等问题上发生冲突后，双边关系变得紧张。

In a survey of Japanese firms with operations in China released on Tuesday, the number of companies planning to expand in the country fell below 30% for the first time in a reflection of the fraught ties.翻译:周二公布的一项针对在中国开展业务的日本企业的调查显示，计划在中国扩张的企业数量首次降至 30% 以下，反映出中日关系的紧张。

Wednesday's meeting also touched on the discharge of the radioactive water. Despite China's repeated protests, Japan started dumping water from its crippled Fukushima nuclear plant in late August, swiftly prompting a Chinese ban on Japanese seafood imports and the postponement of Yamaguchi's visit.翻译:周三的会议还讨论了放射性水的排放问题。尽管中国一再抗议，日本还是于八月下旬开始从受损的福岛核电站倾倒水，迅速促使中国禁止进口日本海鲜，并推迟了山口的访问。

Yamaguchi's two-day visit this week, originally scheduled for end-August, is expected to set the stage for a resumption of dialogue between the LDP-Komeito coalition and the CPC, after both sides broke off talks in 2018.翻译:山口原定于 8 月底进行为期两天的访问，预计将为自民党-公明党联盟与中国共产党在 2018 年中断谈判后恢复对话奠定基础。

Reporting by Ryan Woo; editing by Jason Neely, Alexandra Hudson翻译:瑞恩·吴 (Ryan Woo) 报道；编辑：杰森·尼利、亚历山德拉·哈德森
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国航空监管机构负责人与美国大使寻求增加航班
item.description:
The head of China's civil aviation regulator, Song Zhiyong, met with the U.S. Ambassador in Beijing Nicholas Burns, and exchanged views on pushing for a substantial increase in flights between the two countries, the regulator said on Wednesday.翻译:中国民航局局长宋志勇周三会见了美国驻北京大使尼古拉斯·伯恩斯，就推动两国间航班大幅增加交换了意见。

The Civil Aviation Administration of China (CAAC) welcomes U.S. aviation-related enterprises to operate and develop in China, Song said.翻译:宋说，中国民航局欢迎美国航空相关企业来华经营发展。

Back in August, the United States and China said they would approve twice the number of passenger flights currently permitted for air carriers to fly between the two countries.翻译:早在八月，美国和中国就表示，他们将批准两倍于目前允许航空公司在两国之间飞行的客运航班数量。

In his speech at a reception, Song said the two countries should continue the vision that President Xi Jinping and U.S. President Joe Biden laid out in their recent meeting at APEC and create a new situation for China-U.S. civil aviation cooperation in the future.翻译:宋在招待会上致辞时表示，两国要继承习近平主席和拜登在亚太经合组织会议上提出的愿景，开创未来中美民航合作的新局面。

Song and Burns expounded on those talks, saying they both want to strengthen cooperation in various fields of civil aviation between China and the U.S., according to a statement.翻译:声明称，宋和伯恩斯对会谈进行了阐述，表示双方都希望加强中美民航各领域的合作。

"CAAC welcomes American aviation-related enterprises to operate and develop in China and jointly create a better future for the global aviation industry," Song said.翻译:宋说：“中国民航局欢迎美国航空相关企业来华经营发展，共同创造全球航空业更加美好的未来。”

Both want China and the U.S. to further increase flights by a large margin, Song said, as relations between the two countries show signs of thawing after months of tensions over several global issues.翻译:宋说，双方都希望中美两国进一步大幅增加航班，因为在几个全球问题上的紧张局势持续数月后，两国关系出现解冻迹象。

Reporting by Bernard Orr and Ethan Wang Editing by Jason Neely and Mark Potter翻译:伯纳德·奥尔和伊森·王报道 杰森·尼利和马克·波特编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国将碧桂园列入支持建设者名单草案 - 彭博新闻
item.description:
China has placed debt-laden Country Garden Holdings Co (2007.HK) on a draft list of 50 developers eligible for a range of financing support, Bloomberg reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.翻译:彭博社周三援引知情人士的话报道称，中国已将负债累累的碧桂园控股有限公司（2007.HK）列入了一份有资格获得一系列融资支持的 50 家开发商的草案名单中。

Other distressed developers, such as Sino-Ocean Group (3377.HK) and CIFI Holdings (0884.HK) also figure on the list, it added.翻译:报告补充称，其他陷入困境的开发商，如远洋集团（3377.HK）和旭辉控股（0884.HK）也榜上有名。

Mounting problems in the cash-squeezed and indebted property sector, which accounts for a quarter of China's economic activity, have sparked fears of a broader financial crisis and weigh heavily on economic growth and consumer confidence.翻译:占中国经济活动四分之一的现金紧缩和负债累累的房地产行业日益严重的问题引发了人们对更广泛的金融危机的担忧，并严重影响了经济增长和消费者信心。

Authorities are keen that any risks posed by Country Garden's liquidity problems should not spill over to the wider economy, three sources told Reuters this month as talk swirled of various rescue plans.翻译:三名消息人士本月对路透表示，随着各种救援计划的讨论不断，当局希望碧桂园流动性问题带来的任何风险都不会蔓延到更广泛的经济领域。

Country Garden declined to comment. Sino-Ocean and CIFI did not immediately reply to queries from Reuters on Wednesday.翻译:碧桂园拒绝置评。远洋集团和旭辉周三没有立即回复路透社的询问。

Regulators are set to finalise the list and distribute it to banks and other financial institutions within days, Bloomberg said, citing unnamed sources.翻译:彭博社援引未透露姓名的消息人士称，监管机构将在几天内敲定这份清单，并将其分发给银行和其他金融机构。

Once China's biggest private property developer, Country Garden missed a coupon payment in October, triggering default terms.翻译:碧桂园曾经是中国最大的私营房地产开发商，10月份未能支付息票，引发违约条款。

It is unclear what specific measures will be taken to support the developers on the draft list.翻译:目前尚不清楚将采取哪些具体措施来支持草案名单上的开发商。

The latest news shows China's government has drastically turned its attitude towards the property sector, with more active support measures, in a step "positive for the industry," said Ting Meng, a credit analyst at ANZ Bank China.翻译:澳新银行中国信贷分析师孟婷表示，最新消息显示，中国政府已大幅转变对房地产行业的态度，采取了更积极的支持措施，“对房地产行业有利”。

"However, for defaulted developers, any new cash injection will prioritise the delivery of homes, rather than debt repayment," she said, adding that resolving the debt problems would hinge on future restructuring negotiations.翻译:“然而，对于违约开发商来说，任何新的现金注入都将优先考虑交付房屋，而不是偿还债务，”她说，并补充说，债务问题的解决将取决于未来的重组谈判。

The biggest hurdle to a real property recovery is still "the massive number of overdue housing projects in low-tier cities," brokerage Nomura said in a research note on Tuesday.翻译:野村证券周二在一份研究报告中表示，房地产复苏的最大障碍仍然是“低线城市大量逾期住房项目”。

It added that it expected Beijing would eventually "rescue some major troubled developers and fill the vast funding gap for building and delivering those presold homes".翻译:它补充说，预计北京最终将“拯救一些陷入困境的主要开发商，并填补建设和交付这些预售房屋的巨大资金缺口”。

Many Chinese property developers that defaulted on debt over the past two years face challenges finishing housing projects.翻译:许多在过去两年出现债务违约的中国房地产开发商在完成住房项目时面临着挑战。

With nearly $11 billion of offshore bonds and $6 billion of onshore loans, Country Garden said after the default that it would make sure of home delivery and told some creditors it was targeting a rough offshore debt restructuring plan before year end.翻译:拥有近110亿美元的离岸债券和60亿美元的境内贷款，碧桂园在违约后表示，将确保送货上门，并告诉一些债权人，其目标是在年底前制定一项粗略的离岸债务重组计划。

Reporting by Devika Nair in Bengaluru and Xie Yu in Hong Kong; Editing by Kim Coghill and Clarence Fernandez翻译:Devika Nair 在班加罗尔和谢宇在香港的报道；金·科吉尔和克拉伦斯·费尔南德斯编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾报道选举活动升温之际附近有中国战斗机和轰炸机
item.description:
Taiwan again reported Chinese military activity around the island on Wednesday, with 11 aircraft crossing the sensitive median line of the Taiwan Strait as the island's election campaign kicked into high gear.翻译:周三，台湾再次报道中国在台湾周边的军事活动，随着台湾选举活动进入高潮，有 11 架飞机飞越敏感的台湾海峡中线。

Democratically-governed Taiwan, which China claims as its own territory, has complained for the past four years of regular Chinese military patrols and drills near the island, as Beijing seeks to pressure Taipei over its sovereignty claims.翻译:中国声称拥有民主统治的台湾是其自己的领土，过去四年来，中国在该岛附近定期进行军事巡逻和演习，对中国的定期军事巡逻和演习表示不满，因为北京试图就其主权主张向台北施压。

Taiwan holds presidential and parliamentary polls on Jan. 13 and candidates have to register with the election commission this week in order to take part.翻译:台湾将于1月13日举行总统和议会选举，候选人必须在本周向选举委员会登记才能参加。

The ruling Democratic Progressive Party (DPP), which Beijing views as separatists, registered its presidential ticket on Tuesday, though the opposition is mired in disagreement about a potential joint bid.翻译:被北京视为分裂分子的执政党民进党于周二登记了总统候选人名单，尽管反对派对联合竞选存在分歧。

Taiwan's defence ministry said that starting early Wednesday afternoon it had detected J-10 and J-16 fighters as well as H-6 bombers and early warning aircraft carrying out overseas missions.翻译:台湾国防部表示，从周三下午开始，它发现了执行海外任务的歼10和歼16战斗机以及轰6轰炸机和预警机。

Eleven of those aircraft crossed the Taiwan Strait's median line flying in airspace to the centre and southwest of the island, working with Chinese warships to carry out "joint combat readiness patrols", the ministry added.翻译:国防部补充说，其中11架飞机越过台湾海峡中线，飞往台湾中部和西南部空域，与中国军舰一起进行“联合战备巡逻”。

The strait's median line had previously served as an unofficial barrier between the two sides and which Chinese planes now regularly fly over.翻译:海峡中线此前曾是两岸之间的非正式屏障，现在中国飞机经常飞越该海峡。

Taiwan sent its own forces to monitor, the ministry said.翻译:国防部表示，台湾派出自己的部队进行监视。

China's defence ministry did not answer calls seeking comment. China says its activities near Taiwan are aimed at preventing "collusion" between Taiwan separatists and the United States and to protect China's territorial integrity.翻译:中国国防部没有回复寻求置评的电话。中国表示，其在台湾附近的活动旨在防止台湾分裂分子与美国“勾结”，保护中国的领土完整。

Taiwan's government, which has repeatedly offered talks with China, rejects Beijing's sovereignty claims and says only the island's people can decide their future.翻译:台湾政府多次提出与中国进行谈判，拒绝北京的主权主张，并表示只有台湾人民才能决定他们的未来。

Taiwan's main opposition party, the Kuomintang, traditionally supports close ties with Beijing, and has pledged to re-open dialogue with China should it win the election.翻译:台湾主要反对党国民党历来支持与北京的密切关系，并承诺如果赢得选举，将与中国重新开启对话。

Reporting by Ben Blanchard; Editing by Toby Chopra and Raju Gopalakrishnan翻译:本·布兰查德报道；托比·乔普拉 (Toby Chopra) 和拉朱·戈帕拉克里希南 (Raju Gopalakrishnan) 编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：中国任命金融资深人士朱先生为新任外汇主管 - 消息人士
item.description:
China is set to appoint Zhu Hexin, a veteran banker and chief of state-run financial conglomerate CITIC Group, as the new head of its foreign exchange regulator, four people familiar with the matter said, amid growing headwinds for the economy and markets.翻译:四位知情人士表示，在经济和市场面临的阻力日益加大的情况下，中国将任命资深银行家、国有金融集团中信集团首席执行官朱鹤新为外汇监管机构新任负责人。

Zhu's appointment to lead the State Administration of Foreign Exchange (SAFE) is expected to be announced as soon as this week, said one of the sources.翻译:一位消息人士称，朱镕基领导国家外汇管理局的任命预计最快将于本周宣布。

Zhu, 55, would also be named a deputy governor of the People's Bank of China (PBOC), which oversees the foreign exchange regulator, said the source.翻译:消息人士称，55 岁的朱还将被任命为中国人民银行 (PBOC) 副行长，负责监管外汇监管机构。

Three sources said that the ruling Chinese Communist Party's so-called central organisation department conducted suitability checks on Zhu last week, a practice followed for all high-profile government appointments in the country.翻译:三名消息人士称，执政的中国共产党所谓的中央组织部上周对朱朱进行了适合性审查，这是该国所有高调政府任命所遵循的做法。

Representatives at the PBOC, SAFE, and CITIC (CITIC.UL) did not immediately respond to Reuters' requests for comment. Reuters was not able to reach the party's central organisation department and Zhu for comment.翻译:中国人民银行、国家外汇管理局和中信银行 (CITIC.UL) 的代表没有立即回应路透社的置评请求。路透社未能联系到中共中央组织部和朱朱置评。

All the sources did not wish to be named as they were not authorised to speak to the media.翻译:所有消息人士均不愿透露姓名，因为他们无权接受媒体采访。

Zhu's appointment as the head of SAFE will come at a time when the world's second-largest economy is struggling to boost growth, fend off risk of financial instability, and stabilise the currency to stem capital outflows.翻译:朱镕基被任命为国家外汇管理局局长之际，正值世界第二大经济体努力提振增长、抵御金融不稳定风险、稳定货币以遏制资本外流。

A severe downturn in the property sector, which accounts for about a quarter of economic activity in China, and a mountain of local government debt also pose major challenges for the banking sector and the broader economy.翻译:占中国经济活动约四分之一的房地产行业严重下滑，加上地方政府债务堆积如山，也给银行业和整体经济带来了重大挑战。

Zhu will take over the forex regulatory head role from Pan Gongsheng, who has held the post since 2016 and who was named the central bank governor in July. Zhu was also a contender for the PBOC governor role, Reuters and other media had reported.翻译:朱将从潘功胜手中接过外汇监管负责人的职务，潘功胜自2016年起担任该职务，并于7月被任命为央行行长。据路透社和其他媒体报道，朱也是中国人民银行行长一职的竞争者。

In a sign of his rising status within the government, Zhu was named an alternate member of the Communist Party's Central Committee, the largest of the party's top decision-making bodies, in 2022.翻译:2022年，朱被任命为共产党中央委员会候补委员，这是共产党最大的最高决策机构，这标志着他在政府中的地位不断上升。

He previously held senior posts at state lenders Bank of Communications (601328.SS) and Bank of China (601988.SS).翻译:他此前曾在国有银行交通银行（601328.SS）和中国银行（601988.SS）担任高级职务。

An engineering graduate from the Shanghai University of Finance and Economics, Zhu has also been a deputy central bank governor, and vice governor of Sichuan province in southwestern China.

FORMIDABLE CHALLENGES

In the near term, Zhu's challenges appear formidable.翻译:短期内，朱的挑战显得十分艰巨。

Chinese government advisers will recommend growth targets for next year ranging from 4.5% to 5.5% to a policymakers' meeting, as Beijing seeks to create jobs and keep long-term development goals on track, Reuters reported on Wednesday.翻译:据路透社周三报道，中国政府顾问将向政策制定者会议推荐明年 4.5% 至 5.5% 的增长目标，因为北京方面寻求创造就业机会并保持长期发展目标步入正轨。

China's yuan has lost nearly 3.5% against the dollar so far this year, but peak pessimism may have passed as the yuan firmed 2% in the past week amid a weak U.S. dollar and persistently strong yuan midpoint fixings .翻译:今年迄今为止，人民币兑美元汇率已下跌近3.5%，但悲观情绪的顶峰可能已经过去，在美元疲软和人民币中间价持续走强的情况下，人民币在过去一周坚挺了2%。

The PBOC, which delivered modest interest rate cuts and has pumped more cash into the economy in recent weeks, is constrained in how much it can ease monetary policy for fear of stoking capital flight and hurting the yuan, analysts have said.翻译:分析师表示，中国央行最近几周小幅降息并向经济注入了更多现金，但由于担心引发资本外逃并损害人民币汇率，其放松货币政策的力度受到限制。

Capital outflows from China rose sharply to $75 billion in September, the biggest monthly figure since 2016, Goldman Sachs' preferred gauge of foreign exchange flows showed, underscoring intensifying depreciation pressure on the yuan.翻译:高盛首选的外汇流动指标显示，9月份中国资本外流大幅增至750亿美元，为2016年以来最大月度数字，突显人民币贬值压力加剧。

China's foreign exchange reserves - the world's largest – fell by $26.47 billion in the first 10 months of this year to $3.1 trillion.翻译:中国的外汇储备位居世界第一，今年前10个月减少了264.7亿美元，至3.1万亿美元。

Last month, Chinese President Xi Jinping made his first known visit to the offices of PBOC and SAFE in Beijing since he became president a decade ago, Reuters reported, citing sources, amid mounting economic challenges.翻译:路透社援引消息人士的话报道，上个月，在经济挑战日益严峻的情况下，中国国家主席习近平自十年前就任国家主席以来首次访问了中国人民银行和国家外汇管理局在北京的办公室。

Zhu will take up his new role against the backdrop of other changes in China's regulatory system this year.翻译:朱先生将在今年中国监管体系发生其他变化的背景下履新。

The changes include setting up of a new national financial regulatory administration replacing the existing banking and insurance watchdog, and the unveiling of a super regulator, Central Financial Commission (CFC), with Premier Li Qiang as its head.翻译:这些变化包括设立一个新的国家金融监管机构，取代现有的银行和保险监管机构，以及设立一个超级监管机构——中央金融委员会（CFC），由李强总理担任主席。

Reporting by Beijing and Hong Kong newsrooms; Editing by Sumeet Chatterjee and Muralikumar Anantharaman翻译:北京和香港新闻编辑室的报道；编辑：Sumeet Chatterjee 和 Muralikumar Anantharaman

item.title: 中方表示，维护朝鲜半岛和平稳定符合各方利益
item.description:
China's foreign ministry said it is in the interest of all parties to ensure peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula after North Korea claimed it successfully placed its first spy satellite in orbit, vowing to launch more in the near future.翻译:中国外交部表示，在朝鲜声称成功将第一颗间谍卫星送入轨道后，确保朝鲜半岛的和平与稳定符合各方利益，并誓言在不久的将来发射更多卫星。

After two failed attempts, North Korea's latest launch drew the ire of South Korea and Japan.翻译:在两次尝试失败后，朝鲜的最新发射引起了韩国和日本的愤怒。

"China has taken note of (North Korea's) announcement of its satellite launch and the reactions of relevant parties," spokesperson Mao Ning said in response to a question on the situation at a regular media briefing on Wednesday.翻译:“中方注意到朝鲜宣布发射卫星以及有关方面的反应，”发言人毛宁在周三的例行记者会上回答有关情况的问题时表示。

"Maintaining peace and stability on the peninsula and promoting the process of political settlement of the peninsula issue are in the common interests of all countries in the region," she said.翻译:维护半岛和平稳定、推动半岛问题政治解决进程符合地区各国共同利益。

South Korea, Japan and the United States had coordinated to position Aegis destroyers to track the launch and shared that data, South Korea's military said.翻译:韩国军方表示，韩国、日本和美国已协调部署宙斯盾驱逐舰来跟踪发射并共享数据。

In addition, the U.S. aircraft carrier Carl Vinson arrived at a port in the South Korean city of Busan, part of a mission of extended deterrence against North Korea's nuclear and missile programs.翻译:此外，美国卡尔文森号航空母舰抵达韩国釜山的一个港口，这是对朝鲜核计划和导弹计划进行长期威慑的一部分。

Mao said it is hoped that all parties concerned "will remain calm and exercise restraint" and engage in meaningful dialogue and address each other's legitimate concerns in a balanced manner.翻译:毛泽东表示，希望有关各方保持冷静克制，进行有意义的对话，平衡解决彼此合理关切。

"China will continue to play a constructive role in promoting the political settlement of the Peninsula issue,” she said.翻译:中方将继续为推动半岛问题政治解决发挥建设性作用。

Reporting by Liz Lee; Writing by Bernard Orr; Editing by Jacqueline Wong and Gerry Doyle翻译:丽兹·李报道；伯纳德·奥尔撰写；编辑：Jacqueline Wong 和 Gerry Doyle
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：中国政府顾问呼吁2024年稳增长目标，加大刺激力度
item.description:
Summary:
  • Govt advisers to recommend 2024 growth targets of 4.5-5.5%
  • China to rely on fiscal spending to drive growth next year
  • PBOC may play supporting role with modest policy easing
翻译:概括：
  • 政府顾问建议 2024 年增长目标为 4.5-5.5%
  • 中国明年将依靠财政支出拉动经济增长
  • 央行可能通过适度宽松政策发挥支持作用

Chinese government advisers will recommend economic growth targets for next year ranging from 4.5% to 5.5% to an annual policymakers' meeting, as Beijing seeks to create jobs and keep long-term development goals on track.翻译:中国政府顾问将向年度决策者会议推荐明年4.5%至5.5%的经济增长目标，因为北京寻求创造就业机会并保持长期发展目标步入正轨。

Five of the seven advisers who spoke with Reuters said they favoured a target of around 5%, matching this year's goal. One adviser will propose a 4.5% target, while the other suggested a 5.0-5.5% range.翻译:接受路透社采访的七名顾问中有五名表示，他们赞成将目标定为 5% 左右，与今年的目标相符。一位顾问将提出 4.5% 的目标，而另一位顾问则建议 5.0-5.5% 的范围。

The proposals will be made next month at the ruling Communist Party's annual Central Economic Work Conference that discusses policy plans and the outlook for the world's second-largest economy.翻译:这些建议将于下个月在执政的共产党年度中央经济工作会议上提出，会议将讨论世界第二大经济体的政策计划和前景。

Reaching such targets would require Beijing to step up fiscal stimulus, the advisers said, given that this year's growth has been flattered by last year's low-base effect of COVID-19 lockdowns.翻译:顾问们表示，要实现这些目标，北京需要加大财政刺激力度，因为今年的经济增长因去年新冠病毒 (COVID-19) 封锁的低基数效应而受到影响。

"We need to adopt expansionary fiscal and monetary policy to stimulate aggregate demand," Yu Yongding, a government economist who advocates for a growth target of roughly 5%, told Reuters.翻译:“我们需要采取扩张性财政和货币政策来刺激总需求，”主张5%左右增长目标的政府经济学家余永定对路透社表示。

"Corporate investment demand will not be strong as the confidence of companies has not recovered, so we need to expand infrastructure investment," added Yu, who also favours a budget deficit topping 4% of economic output.翻译:于补充说：“由于企业信心尚未恢复，企业投资需求不会强劲，因此我们需要扩大基础设施投资。”他还支持预算赤字占经济产出的4％以上。

The other advisers spoke on condition of anonymity due to the closed-door nature of the discussions. Top leaders are expected to endorse the target at the December meeting, although it will not be announced publicly until China's annual parliament meeting, usually held in March.翻译:由于讨论是闭门性质的，其他顾问都要求匿名。预计最高领导人将在 12 月的会议上批准这一目标，不过要到通常在 3 月份举行的中国年度人大会议才会公开宣布这一目标。

In October, China unveiled a plan to issue 1 trillion yuan ($139 billion) in sovereign bonds by the end of the year, raising the 2023 budget deficit target to 3.8% of gross domestic product (GDP) from the original 3%.翻译:10月，中国公布了在年底前发行1万亿元人民币（1,390亿美元）主权债券的计划，将2023年预算赤字目标从原来占国内生产总值（GDP）的3%提高到3.8%。

Chinese leaders have pledged to "optimize the structure of central and local government debt", suggesting the central government has room to spend more as its debt as a share of GDP is just 21%, far lower than 76% for local governments.翻译:中国领导人承诺“优化中央和地方政府债务结构”，这表明中央政府有增加支出的空间，因为其债务占GDP的比重仅为21%，远低于地方政府的76%。

"We are stepping up fiscal policy support," said another adviser, to make the "difficult" 2024 target "achievable."翻译:另一位顾问表示：“我们正在加大财政政策支持力度，以使 2024 年“困难的”目标“能够实现”。

Monetary stimulus is expected to play a more limited role as the central bank remains concerned a widening interest rate differential with the West may further weaken the yuan and encourage capital outflows.翻译:由于央行仍担心与西方利差扩大可能进一步压低人民币并鼓励资本外流，预计货币刺激措施的作用将更加有限。

"The space for monetary policy could be bigger if we have greater tolerance for exchange rate fluctuations," said Guan Tao, global chief economist at BOC International and a former official at the State Administration of Foreign Exchange (SAFE).

REFORMS VS STIMULUS

China’s economy grew only 3% in 2022, one of its worst performances in nearly half a century. A Reuters poll in October showed that economists expect it to grow 5.0% in 2023 and 4.5% in 2024, although some have since raised their forecasts.翻译:2022年中国经济仅增长3%，是近半个世纪以来最糟糕的表现之一。路透社 10 月份的一项民意调查显示，经济学家预计 2023 年将增长 5.0%，2024 年将增长 4.5%，尽管此后有些人提高了预测。

In 2022, President Xi Jinping laid out a long-term vision of "Chinese-style modernisation" at a key party meeting, with a goal of doubling China's economy by 2035 that government economists say would require average annual growth of 4.7%.翻译:2022年，国家主席习近平在一次重要的党内会议上提出了“中国式现代化”的长期愿景，目标是到2035年使中国经济翻一番，政府经济学家称这需要年均增长4.7%。

The stuttering post-COVID recovery has prompted many analysts to call for structural reforms that tilt the drivers of economic growth away from property and infrastructure investment and towards household consumption and market-allocation of resources.翻译:新冠疫情后的缓慢复苏促使许多分析师呼吁进行结构性改革，将经济增长的驱动力从房地产和基础设施投资转向家庭消费和资源的市场配置。

Absent that, these economists warn, China may begin flirting with Japan-style stagnation later this decade.翻译:这些经济学家警告说，如果没有这一点，中国可能会在本十年晚些时候开始陷入日本式的停滞。

Beijing has been trying to reduce economic reliance on property, channelling more resources into high-tech manufacturing and green industries, but has struggled to boost consumer and investor sentiment.翻译:北京一直在努力减少经济对房地产的依赖，将更多资源投入高科技制造业和绿色产业，但一直难以提振消费者和投资者情绪。

Policy insiders believe more fundamental changes, especially a revival of market-oriented reforms, are unlikely due to the political environment, under which the state has increased its control over the economy, including the private sector.翻译:政策人士认为，由于政治环境的影响，国家加强了对经济（包括私营部门）的控制，不太可能出现更根本的变化，特别是恢复市场导向的改革。

"If there is no consensus on reforms, we will have to use stimulus to drive growth, even though it will not be sustainable,” a third adviser said.翻译:第三位顾问表示：“如果不能就改革达成共识，我们将不得不利用刺激措施来推动增长，尽管这不可持续。”

($1 = 7.2111 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2111 人民币）

Reporting by Kevin Yao; Editing by Marius Zaharia and Shri Navaratnam翻译:姚凯文报道；编辑：Marius Zaharia 和 Shri Navaratnam

item.title: 斐济总理：中国可能在重要港口、造船厂项目上进行合作
item.description:
Fiji Prime Minister Sitiveni Rabuka told parliament on Wednesday the Pacific Islands nation was likely to collaborate with China on a key port modernisation and shipyard project, after discussing it in a meeting with Chinese president Xi Jinping.翻译:斐济总理西蒂维尼·拉布卡 (Sitiveni Rabuka) 周三向议会表示，在与中国国家主席习近平会面讨论后，斐济可能会与中国就一个重要的港口现代化和造船厂项目进行合作。

Fiji previously sought Australia's involvement to build a modern ship-building facility at Lautoka, officials and a consultant to Rabuka on the project told Reuters.翻译:斐济官员和拉布卡项目顾问告诉路透社，斐济此前曾寻求澳大利亚参与在劳托卡建造一座现代化造船设施。

China is the world's largest shipbuilder, accounting for half of all ships built this year. The pace of expansion of its navy has concerned Australia, which has donated dozens of patrol boats to its Pacific Islands neighbours to boost surveillance of their territorial waters.翻译:中国是世界上最大的造船国，占今年建造的船舶总数的一半。其海军扩张的步伐引起了澳大利亚的担忧，该国已向其太平洋岛屿邻国捐赠了数十艘巡逻艇，以加强对其领海的监视。

Rabuka told Fiji's parliament on Wednesday his government was focused on upgrading infrastructure, "particularly the modernisation of port facilities and shipyards".翻译:拉布卡周三告诉斐济议会，他的政府重点关注基础设施的升级，“特别是港口设施和造船厂的现代化”。

"I anticipate potential collaboration with China in that endeavour, given China's globally competitive shipbuilding," he said.翻译:他说：“鉴于中国造船业具有全球竞争力，我预计在这方面可能与中国进行合作。”

Rabuka met Xi for the first time on the sidelines of the APEC forum in San Francisco last week. He said on Wednesday Fiji supports China's vision for global security, and that Beijing's Belt and Road Initiative "aligns with our nation's development agenda".翻译:拉布卡上周在旧金山亚太经合组织论坛期间首次会见习近平。他周三表示，斐济支持中国的全球安全愿景，北京的“一带一路”倡议“符合我们国家的发展议程”。

Discussions were underway to address Fiji's "debt crisis" responsibly, he added. Fiji has external debt equivalent to 56% of gross domestic product, most of which is owed to multilateral development banks. The amount also includes FJD$375 million ($167 million) of China EXIM bank loans taken out almost a decade ago.翻译:他补充说，正在讨论如何负责任地解决斐济的“债务危机”。斐济的外债相当于国内生产总值的56%，其中大部分欠多边开发银行。该金额还包括近十年前从中国进出口银行获得的 3.75 亿斐济元（1.67 亿美元）贷款。

An Australian-based ship design company said Rabuka had earlier sought the involvement of Australia, Fiji's largest aid donor, in the shipyard project.翻译:一家澳大利亚船舶设计公司表示，拉布卡早些时候曾寻求斐济最大援助国澳大利亚参与该造船厂项目。

Sea Transport chairman Stuart Ballantyne said his company had received a request from Fiji for a fleet of commercial ships it could assemble locally.翻译:海运公司董事长 Stuart Ballantyne 表示，他的公司已收到斐济的请求，希望能够在当地组装一支商船队。

Ballantyne said he had advised Rabuka on the broad scope of the shipyard project, which would involve moving an "archaic" shipyard near Suva to the other side of the island, Lautoka, and constructing two undercover sheds.翻译:巴兰坦表示，他已就造船厂项目的广泛范围向拉布卡提供了建议，该项目将涉及将苏瓦附近的一个“古老”造船厂搬到岛的另一边劳托卡，并建造两个地下棚屋。

Rabuka wants to revive shipbuilding as a training ground for tradespeople in Fiji, from carpenters to electricians, Ballantyne said, adding he was unaware of any Chinese involvement.翻译:巴兰坦表示，拉布卡希望重振造船业，将其作为斐济从木匠到电工等商人的培训基地，并补充说他不知道有任何中国参与。

"If the Chinese have stepped up to the plate - they are the aggressors in the Pacific, the movers and shakers," he said.翻译:他说：“如果中国人站出来，他们就是太平洋地区的侵略者、推动者和推动者。”

The Australian government has funded a feasibility study with Fiji Ports to explore redevelopment options at the Lautoka foreshore, including a barge landing and ship-building and maintenance facility.翻译:澳大利亚政府资助了斐济港口的一项可行性研究，探索劳托卡前滩的重建方案，包括驳船登陆以及造船和维护设施。

Fiji Ports chief executive officer Vajira Piyasena told Reuters the government had called for expressions of interest from investors for a joint shipyard venture in September.翻译:斐济港口首席执行官 Vajira Piyasena 告诉路透社，政府已于 9 月份呼吁投资者表达对合资造船厂的兴趣。

The government advertisement said the project would meet the government's shipbuilding requirements for five years, with a business model based on a joint venture with Fiji Ships and Heavy Industry, a subsidiary of Fiji Ports.翻译:政府广告称，该项目将满足政府五年的造船要求，其商业模式基于与斐济港口子公司斐济船舶重工公司合资。

An official said only local proposals had been received, and the official was not aware of any contract being awarded.翻译:一位官员表示，只收到了当地的建议，该官员不知道是否已授予任何合同。

Fiji Ports referred questions about China's involvement to Rabuka's office, which did not respond to requests for comment.翻译:斐济港口将有关中国参与的问题提交给拉布卡办公室，但该办公室没有回应置评请求。

China's embassy in Fiji did not respond to a request for comment.翻译:中国驻斐济大使馆没有回应置评请求。

China has been pushing for greater security and trade ties with Pacific Islands countries. It has signed a security pact with Solomon Islands, raising alarm in the United States which responded by striking a defence deal with Papua New Guinea.翻译:中国一直在推动与太平洋岛国加强安全和贸易关系。它与所罗门群岛签署了一项安全协议，引起了美国的警惕，美国以与巴布亚新几内亚达成一项防务协议作为回应。

China's policy on the Pacific Island nations fully respects the sovereignty and independence of those countries without attaching political conditions or empty promises, Xi said after meeting Rabuka last week.翻译:习近平上周会见拉布卡后表示，中国对太平洋岛国的政策充分尊重这些国家的主权和独立，不附加政治条件或空头承诺。

Reporting by Kirsty Needham; Editing by Lincoln Feast and Edwina Gibbs翻译:科斯蒂·李约瑟报道；林肯·盛宴和埃德温娜·吉布斯编辑
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 恒大董事长两座豪宅被债权人扣押-当地媒体
item.description:
Two luxury homes in Hong Kong owned by the chairman of embattled property developer China Evergrande Group (3333.HK), Hui Ka Yan, have been seized by a creditor, local media outlet HK01 reported on Wednesday.翻译:据当地媒体 HK01 周三报道，陷入困境的房地产开发商中国恒大集团（3333.HK）董事长许家印在香港拥有的两处豪宅已被债权人扣押。

The properties, located in The Peak, one of the most prestigious neighborhoods in Hong Kong, are valued at more than HK$1.5 billion ($192 million), and will be formally taken over by the creditor within days. An unidentified creditor submitted relevant documents on Tuesday, said the report, without specifying the source of its information.翻译:这些物业位于香港最负盛名的社区之一山顶，价值超过15亿港元（1.92亿美元），并将在几天内被债权人正式接管。报道称，一位身份不明的债权人周二提交了相关文件，但没有具体说明信息来源。

Hui owns the two luxury homes in The Peak, which were pledged to Orix Asia Capital Ltd in November 2021 for undisclosed amounts, according to the Land Registry.翻译:据土地注册处称，许氏拥有山顶的两座豪宅，并于 2021 年 11 月质押给欧力士亚洲资本有限公司，金额未公开。

Orix's spokesperson did not immediately respond to phone and email queries from Reuters, and Evergrande did not immediately reply to a request for comment.翻译:欧力士发言人没有立即回复路透社的电话和电子邮件询问，恒大也没有立即回复置评请求。

Another of Hui's homes next to the two mansions was seized by China Construction Bank (Asia) in November last year.翻译:去年11月，许氏位于两栋豪宅旁边的另一处住宅被中国建设银行（亚洲）没收。

Evergrande is fighting a winding-up petition and has until Dec. 4 to unveil a concrete new restructuring proposal to avoid liquidation.翻译:恒大正在应对清盘申请，并必须在 12 月 4 日之前公布具体的新重组方案以避免清算。

The group's main assets in Hong Kong - its headquarters and a vast plot of rural land - were seized by creditors last year, after the company defaulted on public debts due to a cash crunch.翻译:该集团在香港的主要资产——总部和大片农村土地——去年因现金短缺而拖欠公共债务后被债权人扣押。

($1 = 7.7949 Hong Kong dollars)翻译:(1 美元 = 7.7949 港元)

item.title: 缅甸向中国移交数千名电信诈骗嫌疑人
item.description:
Myanmar authorities have handed over 31,000 telecom fraud suspects to China since law enforcement officers from both countries launched a crackdown on online scams in September, Chinese authorities said on Tuesday.翻译:中国当局周二表示，自两国执法人员9月发起打击网络诈骗以来，缅甸当局已将31,000名电信诈骗嫌疑人移交给中国。

The suspects included 63 "financiers" and ring-leaders of crime syndicates that have cheated Chinese citizens of large sums of money, the Ministry of Public Security said in a statement.翻译:公安部在一份声明中称，犯罪嫌疑人包括63名“金融家”和犯罪集团头目，他们诈骗中国公民巨额资金。

"The crackdown has achieved significant battle results," the ministry said.翻译:公安部表示，此次打击行动取得了显著成效。

More than 100,000 people engage in telecom fraud each day in at least 1,000 scam centres in Myanmar, which shares a border with southwest China, Chinese state media has reported.翻译:据中国官方媒体报道，与中国西南部接壤的缅甸，每天有超过 10 万人在至少 1,000 个诈骗中心从事电信诈骗。

Chinese police started to crack down on the fraud in September and this month, police launched what they said were "swift attacks" on crime gangs in Myanmar.翻译:中国警方从九月份开始打击诈骗活动，本月警方对缅甸的犯罪团伙发起了所谓的“迅速打击”。

The Myanmar ringleader of a gang committed suicide last week while on the run from Myanmar authorities, Chinese police said. Three members of his gang were later handed over to Chinese police.翻译:中国警方称，一名缅甸团伙头目上周在躲避缅甸当局追捕时自杀身亡。该团伙的三名成员后来被移交给中国警方。

With telecom scams in Myanmar targeting Chinese citizens surging, Assistant Foreign Minister Nong Rong visited Myanmar this month, saying China was ready to work with Myanmar on tackling cross-border crime including online gambling.翻译:随着缅甸针对中国公民的电信诈骗激增，外交部部长助理农融本月访问缅甸，表示中方已准备好与缅方合作打击包括网络赌博在内的跨境犯罪。

Nong also said China supported Myanmar in maintaining stability on their common border as Myanmar's junta battled insurgents in the area.翻译:农还表示，在缅甸军政府与该地区的叛乱分子作战之际，中国支持缅甸维护共同边界的稳定。

Myanmar's ruling military is facing attacks on multiple fronts in its borderlands as an alliance of ethnic minority insurgent groups combines with pro-democracy fighters to challenge the junta's rule.翻译:缅甸执政军队在边境地区面临多条战线的攻击，少数民族叛乱组织联盟与民主派战士联合起来挑战军政府的统治。

China has called for peace.翻译:中国呼吁和平。

"China has been playing a constructive role in its own way to promote peace talks and urge relevant parties to put the interests of the people first, cease fire and end war as soon as possible," a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Monday.翻译:外交部发言人周一表示：“中方一直以自己的方式发挥建设性作用，劝和促谈，敦促有关各方以人民利益为重，尽快停火止战。”

Reporting by Albee Zhang and Ryan Woo翻译:Albee 张和 Ryan Woo 报道

item.title: 上海犹太难民历史成为新清唱剧的中心舞台
item.description:
Four years after it was first conceived, the oratorio Emigre made its debut this month in Shanghai, paying tribute to the Chinese financial hub's war-time role in protecting European Jewish refugees who fled to the city in the late 1930s.翻译:清唱剧《流亡者》首次构思四年后，于本月在上海首演，向中国金融中心在战时保护 1930 年代末逃往该市的欧洲犹太难民方面所发挥的作用致敬。

A collaboration between the Shanghai Symphony Orchestra, New York Philharmonic as well as choirs from the U.S. and China, the work premiered on Nov. 17.翻译:该作品由上海交响乐团、纽约爱乐乐团以及中美合唱团合作，于11月17日首演。

Composer Aaron Zigman, known best for his movie scores, said he was approached by Shanghai Symphony Orchestra's maestro Long Yu in 2019 with the idea for a piece telling the story of Shanghai's Jewish refugee history.翻译:以电影配乐而闻名的作曲家亚伦·齐格曼表示，2019 年，上海交响乐团指挥大师余隆找到他，提出创作一部讲述上海犹太难民历史故事的作品的想法。

"This is a story about two German Jewish brothers who had to flee Nazi Germany, and they came to Shanghai, which at that time opened its doors to many Jews," Zigman said.翻译:“这是一个关于两个德国犹太兄弟不得不逃离纳粹德国，来到上海的故事，当时上海向许多犹太人敞开了大门，”齐格曼说。

"It's really a multicultural love story at the end of the day, and then a story of humanity, love, hope and acceptance through the tragedy of loss as well."翻译:“归根结底，这确实是一个多元文化的爱情故事，也是一个在失去亲人的悲剧中讲述人性、爱、希望和接受的故事。”

In the late 1930s, as World War Two was about to break out, Shanghai was one of the few places in the world open to Jewish refugees, as many countries restricted visa access. As an "open port" a visa wasn't required for those arriving in Shanghai, mainly by boat, from Europe.翻译:20世纪30年代末，第二次世界大战即将爆发，上海是世界上少数向犹太难民开放的地方之一，因为许多国家限制签证。作为一个“开放港口”，那些主要从欧洲乘船抵达上海的人不需要签证。

An estimated 20,000 European Jews would escape to Shanghai throughout this period, though their new home was not without strife. China was also at war, with Japan, and Shanghai was occupied by Japanese forces from 1937.翻译:在此期间，估计有 20,000 名欧洲犹太人逃往上海，尽管他们的新家并非没有发生冲突。中国也与日本交战，上海从 1937 年起被日本军队占领。

Mark Campbell, the Pulitzer Prize-winning librettist behind the lyrics for Emigre said he felt the story was "special and important" to tell now, in view of the conflict between Israel and Hamas in Gaza, as well as the war in Ukraine.翻译:普利策奖得主、《移民》歌词作者马克·坎贝尔表示，考虑到以色列和哈马斯在加沙的冲突以及乌克兰的战争，他觉得现在讲述这个故事“特别且重要”。

"I believe that the message of accepting refugees, of accepting people and welcoming them, is resonating even more now," he added.翻译:他补充说：“我相信，接受难民、接受人们并欢迎他们的信息现在更能引起共鸣。”

Chen Jian, curator of the Shanghai Jewish Refugees Museum, was in the audience for Emigre's global premiere at the Jaguar Shanghai Symphony Orchestra Hall in downtown Shanghai.翻译:上海犹太难民博物馆馆长陈健在上海市中心的捷豹上海交响乐团音乐厅观看了《移民》全球首演。

"I think this kind of creation is very meaningful and valuable," he told Reuters before the performance. "In mankind's darkest times, we need kind hearts and good deeds. This story should have an educational effect on how we look at disputes in the world today."翻译:“我认为这种创作非常有意义和有价值，”他在演出前告诉路透社。 “在人类最黑暗的时期，我们需要善良的心和善行。这个故事应该对我们如何看待当今世界的争端产生教育作用。”

The work, sung in English with Chinese supertitles, ran in Shanghai through Nov. 20. It is scheduled to be performed in New York early next year.翻译:这部作品以英文演唱，配有中文字幕，于 11 月 20 日在上海演出。预计明年初在纽约演出。

Reporting by Casey Hall; Editing by Sonali Paul翻译:凯西·霍尔报道；索纳利·保罗编辑

item.title: 尽管当选总统米莱批评，中国仍准备与阿根廷合作
item.description:
China is ready to work with Argentina to keep relations on a "steady" course, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Tuesday, after the presidential election victory of a right-wing libertarian who said he will not deal with communists.翻译:一位外交部发言人周二表示，在一位表示不会与共产党人打交道的右翼自由主义者赢得总统选举后，中国准备与阿根廷合作，使关系保持在“稳定”的轨道上。

Argentinian president-elect Javier Milei has criticised China and Brazil, which are among his country's most important trading partners. A few months ago, Milei even likened the Chinese government to an "assassin" and said the people of China were "not free".翻译:阿根廷当选总统哈维尔·米莱批评中国和巴西，这两个国家是阿根廷最重要的贸易伙伴。几个月前，米雷甚至将中国政府比作“刺客”，并称中国人民“不自由”。

Milei's tough talk on China stands in sharp contrast with a vow of cooperation by the outgoing president, Alberto Fernandez, who visited Beijing last month and hailed China as a "true friend" of Argentina.翻译:米莱对中国的强硬言论与即将卸任的总统阿尔贝托·费尔南德斯的合作誓言形成鲜明对比。费尔南德斯上个月访问了北京，并称赞中国是阿根廷的“真正的朋友”。

Fernandez also pledged coordination with China under frameworks such as the G20 and BRICS.翻译:费尔南德斯还承诺在二十国集团和金砖国家等框架下与中国进行协调。

"Bilateral relations between China and Argentina have shown sound momentum of growth," said Chinese foreign ministry spokesperson Mao Ning.翻译:中国外交部发言人毛宁表示，中阿双边关系呈现良好发展势头。

"China stands ready to work with Argentina to keep our relations on a steady course forward," she said.翻译:中方愿与阿方共同努力，推动两国关系稳定向前发展。

But Diana Mondino, an economist tipped to become foreign minister in the Milei government, was quoted as saying by Russian state-owned news agency RIA Novosti that Argentina would "stop interacting" with the governments of China and Brazil, when asked whether Argentina would encourage exports and imports with those countries.翻译:但俄罗斯国有通讯社俄新社援引即将出任米雷政府外交部长的经济学家戴安娜·蒙迪诺的话说，当被问及阿根廷是否会鼓励两国政府“互动”时，阿根廷将“停止与中国和巴西政府互动”。与这些国家的出口和进口。

Mondino has previously told Reuters that Argentina under Milei had no intention of joining the BRICS grouping, which includes China and Russia. Argentina was among six countries invited to become new members of BRICS, a bloc whose members also include Brazil, India and South Africa.翻译:蒙迪诺此前曾对路透社表示，米莱领导下的阿根廷无意加入包括中国和俄罗斯在内的金砖国家集团。阿根廷是受邀成为金砖国家新成员的六个国家之一，该集团的成员还包括巴西、印度和南非。

Mao, asked at a regular news conference about the comments attributed to Mondino, said the characterisation of Mondino's comments was different from the interview published by RIA Novosti.翻译:毛泽东在例行新闻发布会上被问及蒙迪诺的言论时表示，蒙迪诺言论的描述与俄新社发表的采访内容不同。

"Mondino said in the interview that some in the world misread President-elect Milei's foreign policy," Mao said.翻译:毛泽东说：“蒙迪诺在采访中说，世界上有些人误读了当选总统米莱的外交政策。”

"No countries could step out of diplomatic relations and still be able to engage in economic trade and cooperation. It would be a huge foreign policy mistake for Argentina to cut ties with major countries like China or Brazil," Mao said.翻译:毛泽东说：“任何国家都不可能在断绝外交关系的情况下仍然能够开展经济贸易与合作。阿根廷与中国或巴西等大国断绝关系将是一个巨大的外交政策错误。”

The Chinese foreign ministry said later on Tuesday that Mao was citing Mondino as saying it would be a mistake to cut ties with China or Brazil.翻译:中国外交部周二晚些时候表示，毛泽东援引蒙迪诺的话说，切断与中国或巴西的关系将是一个错误。

Reuters could not immediately find a version of the interview containing those comments. Mondino did not respond to a Reuters request to clarify her comments to RIA Novosti.翻译:路透社无法立即找到包含这些评论的采访版本。蒙迪诺没有回应路透社要求澄清她向俄新社发表评论的请求。

Earlier this month, Mondino said Argentina had no problem trading with Brazil, and as for China, Milei would seek to end opaque state-to-state deals.翻译:本月早些时候，蒙迪诺表示阿根廷与巴西的贸易没有问题，至于中国，米雷将寻求结束不透明的国与国之间的交易。

"What we are not going to do are secret contracts. Argentina, this government, in the last 20 years, has had multiple secret negotiations," she said. "That is not normal and it is what we have said we are not going to do."翻译:“我们不会做的是秘密合同。阿根廷政府在过去20年里进行了多次秘密谈判，”她说。 “这是不正常的，我们已经说过我们不会这样做。”

Chinese state media has so far played down Milei's comments but said it would be Argentina's loss if it were to shut China out of its market.翻译:中国官方媒体迄今为止淡化了米雷的言论，但表示如果将中国排除在市场之外，那将是阿根廷的损失。

Reporting by Ryan Woo; Editing by Alex Richardson and Grant McCool翻译:瑞恩·吴 (Ryan Woo) 报道；亚历克斯·理查森和格兰特·麦库尔编辑

item.title: 独家：中国国有银行正在买入人民币，加速人民币升值
item.description:
China's major state-owned banks have been active in the currency market this week, buying the yuan and helping hasten its recovery against a broadly weaker U.S. dollar, two sources told Reuters on Tuesday.翻译:两位消息人士周二告诉路透，中国主要国有银行本周在货币市场上表现活跃，买入人民币，帮助加速人民币兑美元普遍走弱的复苏。

The big banks, which sometimes act on behalf of Chinese monetary authorities, have in the past year often sold dollars to slow the yuan's decline.翻译:有时代表中国货币当局行事的大型银行在过去一年中经常出售美元以减缓人民币贬值。

Their continued yuan-buying activity this week while the currency was already rising was a surprise to the sources, who spoke on condition of anonymity as they are not authorised to speak to media about the matter.翻译:本周，在人民币已经升值的情况下，他们继续进行人民币购买活动，这令消息人士感到意外。消息人士要求匿名，因为他们无权向媒体谈论此事。

The yuan has gained 2% in the past week, to stand at levels of around 7.13 to the dollar - its highest in nearly four months.翻译:人民币兑美元汇率在过去一周上涨了 2%，达到 7.13 左右的水平，创近四个月以来的最高水平。

The sources said the state banks seemed to be following their usual combination of swaps and spot market activity, and were seen exchanging yuan for dollars in the onshore swap market and selling those dollars in the spot currency market.翻译:消息人士称，国有银行似乎遵循了通常的掉期和现货市场活动组合，并在境内掉期市场将人民币兑换成美元，并在即期货币市场出售这些美元。

Their action over the past week came amid broad dollar weakness. The dollar index , which measures the currency's value against major trading partners, has retreated more than 3% in November, as U.S. yields succumb to signs of a peak in Federal Reserve monetary tightening.翻译:他们过去一周的行动是在美元普遍疲软的情况下采取的。由于美国国债收益率屈服于美联储货币紧缩政策见顶的迹象，衡量美元兑主要贸易伙伴汇率的美元指数11月份已回落超过3%。

Some market participants said state banks might be trying to speed the yuan's gains and spur exporters to convert more of their FX receipts into yuan. The Chinese currency is still down more than 3% against the dollar this year.翻译:一些市场参与者表示，国有银行可能正试图加速人民币升值，并刺激出口商将更多外汇收入兑换成人民币。今年人民币兑美元汇率仍下跌3%以上。

The selling of dollars by state banks caused the onshore spot yuan to briefly touch 7.1296 per dollar, firmer than its daily official guidance for the first time in four months.翻译:国有银行抛售美元导致在岸即期人民币兑美元短暂触及7.1296，四个月来首次高于每日官方指引。

The People's Bank of China (PBOC) has also been lowering the dollar-yuan daily fixing rate this week. On Tuesday, it set the midpoint at a 3-1/2-month low of 7.1406 per dollar.翻译:中国人民银行（PBOC）本周也降低了美元兑人民币每日中间价。周二，它将中点定为 3-1/2 个月低点 7.1406 美元兑美元。

"It is surprising to see they keep lowering the fixing at this rate. To me, it looks like they are doing preparatory work ahead of a policy rate cut," said Kiyong Seong, lead Asia macro strategist at Societe Generale.翻译:法国兴业银行首席亚洲宏观策略师 Kiyong Seong 表示：“令人惊讶的是，他们不断以这样的利率下调中间价。在我看来，他们似乎正在为政策利率下调做准备工作。”

"When the external environment is favourable, they appear to strengthen the CNY as much as possible."翻译:“当外部环境有利时，他们似乎会尽可能地强化人民币汇率。”

Recent data shows the recovery in the world's second-largest economy remains uneven, with industrial output and retail sales surprising on the upside in October, while manufacturing activity and consumer prices continued to fall.翻译:最新数据显示，世界第二大经济体的复苏仍不平衡，10月份工业产出和零售销售意外上升，而制造业活动和消费者价格继续下降。

While the economy still needs more policy stimulus, analysts say further monetary easing could add downside pressure on the Chinese currency, given the wide differential between interest rates in China and other economies, particularly the United States.翻译:尽管经济仍需要更多政策刺激，但分析师表示，鉴于中国与其他经济体（尤其是美国）的利率差异巨大，进一步的货币宽松可能会增加人民币的下行压力。

The PBOC has been injecting cash through its medium-term lending facility loans into the banking system, but has of late kept the rate on those loans unchanged.翻译:中国人民银行一直通过中期借贷便利向银行体系注入现金，但最近保持这些贷款利率不变。

"Some volatilities around this level could be likely at this time, unless there are more further significant downside dollar moves or additional major sentiment positive events," said Zhi Xiaojia, chief China economist at Credit Agricole.翻译:法国农业信贷银行(Credit Agricole)首席中国经济学家支晓佳表示，“除非美元进一步大幅下行或出现其他重大情绪积极事件，否则目前可能会在这一水平附近出现一些波动。”

"Indeed, the yield gap remains quite wide, and we are still expecting more policy easing, including PBOC rate and reserve requirement ratio cut."翻译:“事实上，收益率差距仍然相当大，我们仍然预计会有更多政策放松，包括央行降息和下调存款准备金率。”

Zhi said she was "relatively constructive" on the yuan into the end of the year and 2024.翻译:支表示，她对今年年底和2024年的人民币汇率“相对有建设性”。

Reporting by Shanghai Newsroom; Editing by Simon Cameron-Moore, Vidya Ranganathan and Nick Macfie翻译:上海新闻编辑室报道；西蒙·卡梅伦-摩尔、维迪亚·兰加纳坦和尼克·麦克菲编辑

item.title: 中国军舰事件后澳大利亚表示国防人员的安全“重中之重”
item.description:
The safety and wellbeing of Australian defence personnel is Canberra's "utmost priority" and Australia expects all countries to operate militaries in a safe and professional manner, Foreign Minister Penny Wong said on Tuesday.翻译:外交部长黄英贤周二表示，澳大利亚国防人员的安全和福祉是堪培拉的“首要任务”，澳大利亚希望所有国家以安全和专业的方式运作军队。

Wong's comments came a week after an incident involving a Chinese warship and an Australian navy vessel in Japan's Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) in which an Australian military diver was injured.翻译:黄发表此番言论的一周前，一艘中国军舰和一艘澳大利亚海军舰艇在日本专属经济区（EEZ）发生了一起事件，其中一名澳大利亚军事潜水员受伤。

"We have raised our serious concerns with the Chinese authorities following what we regard as unsafe and unprofessional interaction with the PLA Navy destroyer," she said, reiterating Prime Minister Anthony Albanese's comments on Monday.翻译:她表示：“在我们认为与解放军海军驱逐舰发生不安全和不专业的互动之后，我们已向中国当局提出了严重关切。”她重申了安东尼·阿尔巴内塞总理周一的言论。

"These events occurred within Japan's EEZ and international waters and Australia's principled position is that we expect all countries, including ourselves, to operate militaries in a safe and professional manner," Wong said at a joint press conference with her Indian counterpart Subrahmanyam Jaishankar in New Delhi.翻译:“这些事件发生在日本专属经济区和国际水域，澳大利亚的原则立场是，我们希望所有国家，包括我们自己，以安全和专业的方式运作军队，”黄在与印度外长苏杰生在纽交所举行的联合新闻发布会上表示。德里。

HMAS Toowoomba - a long-range frigate - was conducting a diving operation on Nov. 14 to clear fishing nets from its propellers when the Chinese warship acted in a dangerous manner, Australia has said.翻译:澳大利亚表示，11 月 14 日，英国皇家海军图文巴号 (HMAS Toowoomba) 远程护卫舰正在执行潜水作业，清除螺旋桨上的渔网，此时中国军舰的行为十分危险。

A People's Liberation Army Navy (PLA) destroyer approached HMAS Toowoomba, despite the Australian vessel notifying the Chinese warship of a diving operation, and operated its hull-mounted sonar in a manner that posed a safety risk, Australia has said.翻译:澳大利亚表示，尽管澳大利亚军舰向中国军舰发出了潜水行动通知，但中国人民解放军海军（PLA）驱逐舰还是接近了图文巴号，并以构成安全风险的方式操作其船体声纳。

Beijing has rejected the accusations as reckless and irresponsible and urged Canberra to respect the facts, in an incident which comes amid efforts by the two countries to improve relations.翻译:北京否认这些指控是鲁莽和不负责任的，并敦促堪培拉尊重事实，这一事件发生在两国努力改善关系之际。

The Chinese destroyer Ningbo monitored and identified HMAS Toowoomba, all while keeping a safe distance from it and did not carry out any activities that might affect the diving operations of the Australian side, Beijing has said.翻译:北京方面表示，中国“宁波”号驱逐舰对“图文巴”号进行了监视和识别，并与其保持安全距离，没有进行任何可能影响澳方潜水作业的活动。

Wong and Australia's Deputy Prime Minister and Defence Minister Richard Marles held talks known as the "2+2 Dialogue" with their Indian counterparts on Monday to discuss their cooperation in the Indo-Pacific region and mutual concerns about China, among others.翻译:黄和澳大利亚副总理兼国防部长理查德·马勒斯周一与印度外长举行了“2+2对话”，讨论了两国在印太地区的合作以及对中国的共同关切等。

India's relations with China have deteriorated since a 2020 border clash between their militaries in which 20 Indian soldiers and four Chinese troops were killed.翻译:自2020年两国军队边境冲突导致20名印度士兵和4名中国士兵死亡以来，印度与中国的关系恶化。

Wong said Australia and India both have very substantive economic relationship with China, recognise China’s importance and place in the region, and will continue to engage with it.翻译:黄说，澳大利亚和印度都与中国有着非常实质性的经济关系，认识到中国在本地区的重要性和地位，并将继续与其接触。

Australia, she added, "will cooperate where we can, we will disagree where we must, and we will engage in our national interest".翻译:她补充说，澳大利亚“将在力所能及的地方进行合作，在必须的地方提出不同意见，并且我们将维护我们的国家利益”。

item.title: 调查显示，不到 30% 的日本企业计划在中国扩张
item.description:
The number of Japanese firms planning to expand in China has fallen to less than 30% for the first time, according to a survey published on Tuesday, with economic slowdown, increasing competition and geopolitical tension putting many off.翻译:周二公布的一项调查显示，由于经济放缓、竞争加剧以及地缘政治紧张局势，计划在中国扩张的日本企业数量首次降至不到 30%。

The waning appetite for Japanese businesses to augment operations in Japan's biggest trade partner, alongside the United States, underscores fraught bilateral ties between the east Asian neighbours.翻译:日本企业对扩大在日本最大贸易伙伴以及美国的业务的兴趣减弱，突显了东亚邻国之间的双边关系令人担忧。

In an annual survey by the Japan External Trade Organisation, a semi-governmental export promotion agency, 27.7% of 710 companies said they were expecting to expand operations in China in the next a year or two.翻译:半政府出口促进机构日本贸易振兴机构的年度调查显示，710 家公司中有 27.7% 表示，他们预计在未来一两年内扩大在中国的业务。

The percentage declined from 33.4% last year and 40.9% in 2021.翻译:这一比例较去年的33.4% 和2021 年的 40.9% 有所下降。

Some 31 firms attributed their downsizing to economic uncertainty and a sluggish market, while 15 blamed a slump in Japanese auto sales in China, the world's top car market.翻译:约31家公司将裁员归咎于经济不确定性和市场低迷，而15家公司则将其归咎于日本汽车在全球最大汽车市场中国的销量下滑。

Japanese car makers, like other foreign brands, face the rise of domestic players in China, the popularity of electric vehicles and growing price competition.翻译:与其他外国品牌一样，日本汽车制造商面临着中国本土企业的崛起、电动汽车的普及以及日益激烈的价格竞争。

Seven firms also noted rising geopolitical risks, with bilateral relations, rarely smooth, have been particularly strained over recent months.翻译:七家公司还指出，地缘政治风险不断上升，双边关系很少顺利，近几个月来尤其紧张。

China last month arrested a Japanese executive, an employee of Japanese drugmaker Astellas Pharma (4503.T), on suspicion of espionage. The arrest has had a chilling effect on business, Japanese officials say.翻译:中国上个月以涉嫌间谍罪逮捕了一名日本制药商安斯泰来制药（Astellas Pharma，4503.T）的员工，一名日本高管。日本官员表示，这次逮捕对商业产生了寒蝉效应。

Japan infuriated China when it began releasing treated radioactive water from its wrecked Fukushima nuclear plant into the ocean in August, leading to a Chinese ban on Japanese seafood.翻译:八月，日本开始将失事福岛核电站处理过的放射性水排入海洋， 激怒了中国，导致中国对日本海鲜实施禁令。

Chinese President Xi Jinping and Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida last week said they would pursue mutually beneficial relations in their first face-to-face talks in a year.翻译:中国国家主席习近平和日本首相岸田文雄上周表示，他们将在一年来的首次面对面会谈中寻求互利关系。

Reporting by Satoshi Sugiyama; editing by Robert Birsel翻译:杉山聪的报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑
